content: E-mobility which represents our xEV and ADAS applications, expanded to a record 41% of automotive sales in the fiscal second quarter, and we are pleased with the balanced contribution of both, our sensing and power products, to this growth. That said, we continue to be very positive on our growth expectations as reflected by our third quarter guidance and increased revenue outlook for fiscal '23, and we are confident in Allegro's ability to outperform underlying markets as we execute our strategies. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
